resources.string: Jumping Jacks are a basic structural workout and this exercise is beneficial for heart and lungs.
The wall sit is a bit different from typical squalts since you\'re holding a static position for a certain period of time.
A basic push up is an effective way strengthen the chest and arm muscles, and can be easily scaled as you get stronger.
They\'re a lot like sit-ups,except that instead of lifting your entire back off the floor,you only lift your upper back.
Step exercises are ideal for building muscle in your lower body.At the same time,they burn calories for weight control.
The squat is an excellent upper and lower body workout that primarlly targets your thighs and butt.
This medium-intensity exercise uses your own body weight to strengthen your triceps.
The plank ia a balance and core conditioning exercise.In yoga,the plank is often done as part of the sun saluation sequence.
They are often used by runners and other athletes to improve running from as well as lower body speed.
Learning how to do lunges correctly can help get your quadriceps, hamstrings, buttocks and hips into shape.
Athletic performance in sports involving torso rotation, such as tennis,hockeyand baseball.
A side plank modifies the stretch just enough to strengthen your entire core in additon to your obliques and rectus abdominis.
